General.Name: Atomic Minerals Corp
General.Description: Atomic Minerals Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of resource properties in Canada. Its property includes Gravity Jack property located in the New Westminster mining division, British Columbia, Canada. Further, the company has an option to hold 100% interest in Lloyd Lake Uranium project, located in prolific Athabasca basin, Saskatchewan, Canada. It was formerly known as Resolve Ventures Inc. and changed its name to Atomic Minerals Corporation in November 2021. Atomic Minerals Corporation was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1100 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A6
